name: Side Dumbbell Trunk Flexion
how_to_perform:
* Start lying on your side with your feet touching and a dumbbell held to the side of your chest, near your top arm. Your bottom arm should be resting lightly on the floor for support.
* Engage your core muscles by drawing your belly button towards your spine. This will help maintain stability throughout the movement.
* Slowly lift the dumbbell up and away from your body as high as possible while keeping it to the side of your chest.
* Hold the top position for a brief moment to maintain tension on your abdominal muscles.
* Lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position, maintaining control throughout the movement. Repeat on the other side by switching arm positions.
short_summary: A unilateral exercise that targets the rotational aspect of the core muscles, promoting strength and stability.
